subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Yossi Benayoun scored three goals Saturday as Liverpool beat Havant and Waterlooville, 5-2, in the fourth round of England’s F.A. Cup. Liverpool twice rallied from a goal down to avoid possibly the biggest upset in the Cup’s 137-year history. Havant and Waterlooville plays in the sixth tier of English soccer, two below the lowest fully professional league.
snippet: Yossi Benayoun scored three goals Saturday as Liverpool beat Havant and Waterlooville, 5-2, in the fourth round of England’s F.A. Cup. Liverpool twice rallied from a goal down to avoid possibly the biggest upset in the Cup’s 137-year history....
